message: Let's split relatively evenly, but slightly in my favor considering I'm making the first move.  This ensures we both benefit before inflation eats into the value.
Your offer was tempting, Alice, but I'm confident we can reach an even more mutually beneficial agreement.  Let's swap amounts and avoid further inflation.
Bob, it seems we both want to maximize our gains. Let's stop wasting time with the back and forth and split this right down the middle. A 50/50 split ensures we both get a fair deal.
